mapper.select:
SELECT stationNo,station_name as stationName,
${cal}(POWER(1.07,1.8*${element})) as val
${cal}(${element}) as val
GROUP BY stationNo

choose.when:
select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,${cal}(${element}) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime)
choose.otherwise:
SELECT year,sum(val) as val,stationNo,stationName,longitude,latitude FROM ( select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,${cal}(${element}) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime)+1 as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime) UNION ALL select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,${cal}(${element}) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime) )t GROUP BY stationNo,year

mapper.select: SELECT t.stationNo,t.ObserverTime as observerTime,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${element} as val

choose.when: select t.stationNo,t.ObserverTime as observerTime,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${element} AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
choose.otherwise:
select t.stationNo,t.ObserverTime as observerTime,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${element} AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime)+1 as year
UNION ALL select t.stationNo,t.ObserverTime as observerTime,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${element} AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year

mapper.select: SELECT t.stationNo,b.station_name AS stationName,SUM( ${element} ) AS val FROM t_mete_ns_multi_year t JOIN geography_station_info b ON t.stationNo = b.device_id WHERE ${condition} AND t.ObserverTime BETWEEN '${ST}' and '${ET}' AND t.${element} BETWEEN ${min} AND ${max} GROUP BY stationNo
